document.full_text: yemen's president ali abdullah saleh welcomed a gulf cooperation council initiative for a power transfer, but said it must fit with constitutional laws, suggesting he may try to stay in power until his term ends in 2013.
document.title: yemen's saleh conditionally welcomes transition plan
lines_and_colors: yemen's president ali abdullah saleh welcomed a gulf cooperation council initiative for a power transfer, but said it must fit with constitutional laws, suggesting he may try to stay in power until his term ends in 2013.
